channel.title: Hypervivid ~ Hypersoft
channel.description: Experimental webspace for exploring digital art, technology and the web.

item.title: About
item.description: What is this project? What does this space contain? Why? Who am I? Do you care?

item.title: Alien Patterns
item.description: On combining modified noise and domain warping to produce alien patterns

item.title: Alien Skies
item.description: Strange perspective distortion for alien skies. A test for a larger composition.

item.title: Block Dissolve
item.description: Combining two different feedback passes with complex domain warping. Producing organically, dissolving substrate blocks. Builds on previous techniques.

item.title: Breath Crunch
item.description: A breathing exercise. Doctors don't want you to breathe like this. Playing with ritual and stupid mindfulness.

item.title: Chaos Growth
item.description: Accidental chaotic growth that ocurred when playing around with space-colonization algorithms. The branches never quite reach their goals.

item.title: City Pond
item.description: Photos taken by and around a small pond located in the city where I live.

item.title: Cliffscapes
item.description: Continuation of formations and glow-tree sketches: a landscape and calm skies. A tree structure controls the form of the cliffscape.

item.title: Contact
item.description: A form for sending me an email. Nothing more.

item.title: Cringe Core
item.description: Short thoughts about cringe.

item.title: Digital Biophilia
item.description: Some thoughts on the biophilia hypothesis and digital spaces.

item.title: Digital Gardening
item.description: Some thoughts about digital and generative gardening.

item.title: My Take on Domain Warping
item.description: How I've used domain warping to achieve strange generative effects.

item.title: Ethereal Bits
item.description: A node for simple html/css/svg aesthetics and experiments. Exploring how native web tools can be used to create unexpected effects.

item.title: Flat Clouds
item.description: Soft particles, shader builders, generative geometry distortion. Feeling void of thoughts, flat, but sometimes creased. An undeveloped idea.

item.title: Fluid Feedback
item.description: More feedback experiments. Domain warping with a feedback component. Refresh the page: there's some variations.

item.title: Foliage Fragments
item.description: Image fragments extracted using cellular automata, flickering in a feedback loop. Another take on foliage. WARNING: contains flashing images.

item.title: Foliage Grids
item.description: Dynamic pixelation and image displacement grids. A small study with various foliage details. Combining generative techniques and photography.

item.title: Formations
item.description: Generative rock-like formations and a background feedback effect. Doing some tests with natural-looking structures in synthetic environments.

item.title: Frag Fuse
item.description: Photo fragments, warped and mixed to produce eerie textures and patterns.

item.title: Glow Tree
item.description: Simple tree structure and octree visualization. Mixing organic algorithms and less organic data structures.

item.title: Hyper
item.description: Hyperwords, meaningless or hyperclear. Maybe everything is amplified. Maybe this node is meaningless. At least it's somewhat fun.

item.title: Immerse
item.description: Organic substrate and floating 3D shapes. Play with feedback, breathing and interactivity.

item.title: Intro
item.description: A short site description.

item.title: Jolt Gate
item.description: Building structures submerged in complex domain warping shaders. Introducing simple shapes into these effects can drastically alter the effect.

item.title: Journal Artifacts
item.description: A small project based on (poetic) journal artifacts. An abstract source of memory prompts.

item.title: Latest
item.description: Displays the most recently created and most recently updated nodes. Just a utility.

item.title: Less Flat
item.description: Thoughts about artistic creation as self-exploration.

item.title: Links
item.description: Hyperlinks to other nodes on the web. Things I've encountered and found interesting. A curated set of bookmarks.

item.title: Living Hobbling Goo
item.description: Some jumbled words and an experiment with documentation/presentation/design. Things are moving and living without aim.

item.title: Making Comfort
item.description: Short poetic image project. Some photos, some notes, some movement. Aesthetic test mixed with journaling.

item.title: manifesto
item.description: Site philosophy, some approaches and ideas about internet interaction, softer futures, and digital creation.

item.title: Mappings
item.description: Some thoughts about art and map-making as a creative tool.

item.title: Markup Dada
item.description: Simple HTML/CSS/JS test for creating animated patterns using the DOM.

item.title: Medusa Network
item.description: Dithering, living rows and grids, jellyfish, glitchy and organic. An expansion on the Noise Construct experiment.

item.title: Characteristics of Modified Noise
item.description: A few of my common methods for modifying standard noise functions.

item.title: moons
item.description: Simple CSS test.

item.title: Moss Structure
item.description: More bio-studies. Shader systems used to create moss-like structures. Obsessed with the color green.

item.title: Neon Moss
item.description: A generative system for creating plant-like geometry, rendered in a neon glow. One of my first proper biophilic studies.

item.title: Nest
item.description: Another shader and another simple shape to localize certain parts of the effect. Maybe a nest of small underwater creatures.

item.title: Noise Construct
item.description: Intense dithering and domain warping patterns. Digital static mixed with underlying organic structures.

item.title: Objects
item.description: Localized domain warping "objects". I enjoyed playing with possible looks for abstract floating entities. These things just are.

item.title: Places and things
item.description: Another series of photographs. Another slice of time, another tone. Just a collection.

item.title: Raw Making
item.description: Thoughts about hurry sickness, productivity and raw creation.

item.title: Rehash Transform
item.description: Instancing experiment, custom shader builder, and the mind of the internet. Conceptual visualization of a creation/derviation loop. A web mind, I guess.

item.title: Remnant Mappings
item.description: Strange maps of strange objects. Maybe rocks? Or scraps found in the dirt? Playing with slow and imperfect revelations.

item.title: Retro Core
item.description: Experiments with texture and confused depth. 3D shapes turned flat using transparency and disabled depth testing.

item.title: Rhizome
item.description: All references to Deleuze become a bit of a meme. But the underlying structure of this piece is rhizomatic nonetheless. Substrate and space colonization experiment.

item.title: Skew Bulbs
item.description: Trigonometric functions, noise, and normal map generation. The surface is rendered as a evolving metallic material.

item.title: Slices
item.description: Experiment with 3D CSS rendering, photography, and digital spaces. Located externally; will be opened in an iframe.

item.title: Solar Chrome
item.description: Chrome, so hip and cool. Modern, punk even. Here's some chrome and generative geometries.

item.title: Solar Landscape
item.description: An extension of solar chrome. Playing around with instancing and composition. I do not recommend opening this on a mobile device.

item.title: Substrate Catalogue
item.description: A catalogue of substrate shaders with stream-of-consciousness descriptions.

item.title: Substrates
item.description: A text about a node-based visual programming application developed for the web, used as the core tool of a lot of my recent generative art.

item.title: Summer Static
item.description: A couple of photographs from this summer. Nothing special. Just trying to capture that sweet endless summer vibe.

item.title: Super Cell
item.description: Warping lines in multiple layers makes for a strange, morphing life-form.

item.title: Swamp Mass
item.description: Using noise and domain warping as to as an analogue for biological systems. Sophisticated shaders can produce mesmerizing biological effects.

item.title: Virtual Distance
item.description: A css experiment with endless banner scrolling and exaggerated shadows.

item.title: Virtual Imprint
item.description: Complex domain warping patterns, warped geometries, strange reflections with environment map generated in real-time. GPU intensive.

item.title: Waft
item.description: Pictures from winter. Experimenting with (slightly) more aggressive editing and a dramatic flash.

item.title: Weave
item.description: A combination of generative techniques: flowfields, plant-like growth algorithms, and noise.

item.title: Web Fuse
item.description: Building on previous pixel mixing techniques, but with internet images as subject. Hypermemes, why not?
